snippet: In this summer’s new TV offerings reality shows breed more reality shows, and Snooki, from “Jersey Shore,” is expecting a new generation on the air in “Snooki and JWoww.”
abstract: Jon Caramanica offers a guide to the summer's latest crop of reality television series, many of which are sequels, spinoffs or a familiar updating of older reality shows.
lead_paragraph: In this summer’s new TV offerings reality shows breed more reality shows, and Snooki, from “Jersey Shore,” is expecting a new generation on the air in “Snooki and JWoww.”

headline.seo: New Generations of Reality Shows for Summer
headline.main: Sun, Screen and Bites of Reality
headline.print_headline: Sun, Screen And Bites Of Reality
